attributes.action: consult with Locl Authorities in order to cause those Authorities, who have withdrawn Pensioners' Concessional Fees for Adult Education, to reinstate such Concessions with immediate effect..
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Government has long supported the notion and principle of education 'from cradle to grave'.  The action of Local Authorities. who have withdrawn Concessional Fees for Pensioners, denies that principle, since it places the cost of Courses beyond Pensioner means.
